location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Captain George Brown Walker, Commander of the HC Cruizer Benares

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting that the Captain proceeds to Dibaye [Dubai] to investigate allegations made by Shaikh Sallah bin Suggur, Acting Chief at Sharga [Sharjah], that Shaikh Joach has taken a number of boats belonging to that port. It notes that the Resident doubts that he is telling the whole truth, and thus the need for an investigation.It also recommends that Reizza Ali, the company's native agent at Sharga, is employed as an interpreter at Dibaye.
